characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings (mentioned),  Words of Radiance

characterDescription:
The Kadasix of Kings is also known as Jezerezeh in Vorinism, as well as (even if mistakenly) the Stormfather. He is associated with the number Jes, the essence Zephyr (Wind), and the attributes Protecting and Leading.
The Prime Kadasix is a revered provider.
